JK LOL.

He's been in every fucking game for 7 seasons. Compare him to corn flakes. They're basic. They're effective. You can do a lot with it. You can add sugar, berries, tons of stuff to give it flavor. **But it's still fucking corn flakes.** Do YOU want corn flakes present at every breakfast? FOR SEVEN YEARS?

**I'm tired of corn flakes. I'm tired of Lee.**

Lee Sin is a spoonful of cancer.

People do not play lee because he is good. he is popular even when he is bad. 

they play him because his kit is fun.

 for example: Ivern is straight up busted right now, but has a lower playrate. Lee Sin is not busted, just relatively strong. and he is being played all the time. 


People play this game for fun. Sure we love to win and we're all serious but there are very few jungle champions as fun as Lee Sin. Hell he may be the MOST fun jungler out there come to think of it. 


I'm tired of Lee too, just like I'm tired of Lucian, Yasuo, Ahri, Ezreal, and Thresh...but there's a reason champs are popular. just gotta accept it.

I really don't know. That argument might have been passable for, say, 15-25% pickrate, but 40? Is Lee that much more fun than other 130 champions? Does Riot suck at champion design so much that they can't make a champion at least equally fun as Lee in more than a hundred attempts?

Back in Cinderhulk meta Lee sported around 18% pickrate for a few patches. Less than half of current pickrate. He didn't receive significant kit changes which made him more fun since then. Riot simply nerfed his competitors and buffed him back to #1 spot.
That's more than half of his playerbase not playing him because he's fun but because he's undisputed king of the jungle.

Take Lucian as another example - another champion you mentioned. Lucian is fun to play and flashy champion, same as Lee. He has strong early game during which he can build a sizeable lead for himself if played properly, same as Lee - yet he only started seeing this much play after BoTRK changes, before which he was under 10% pickrate. Again, BoTRK changes didn't magically make him more fun - they just made him busted enough to be picked in almost half of all games.
I love Corn Flakes.

Yeah he needs changes now but don't make shit up to fit your agenda
Oh, I'm sorry, he has only absolutely dominated 4 seasons instead of 6, that fixes fucking everything...

I see you a lot on the Lee Sin hate train.  Give us some fixes then instead of being condescending.  I for one think he's in a fine place, sure he's strong but at least he takes skill.

EDIT: I foresee downvotes
Ok, here it is. Reduce ult scaling from 200% to 150% and remove his ability to jump to wards, make it allied units only. Boom, problem solved.

Lee Sin revolves around jumping to wards, removing it on other characters was okay because they don't have it as an essential mechanic.

If you take away Lee Sin's ward hopping ability, you will need to give him something in return.

Lee Sin isn't extremely good right now, nerfing his ult AND the ward hop would definitely nerf him to near azir level, and that shouldn't happen.

Azir was put down there because he was SO OPPRESSIVE he couldn't even be faced in a NERFED STATE.

Lee Sin shouldn't be put down there just because you are sick of him.

If you take away Lee Sin's ward hopping, expect there to be buffs in the rest of his kit

"Isn't extremely good" Yet he maintains a 50% winrate despite being in 40% of games and about half of his playerbase playing him in less than 50 ranked games. His nerf was inconsequential, don't act like its hurt him. I never mentioned Azir, but now that you did, Lee is just as oppressive, seeing as he has a 58% win ratio if the game ends by 25 minutes. He is so oppressive in the early game it isn't even funny. I don't want him nerfed because I am sick of him, I want him nerfed because he is bullshit and so strong he has been dominating the jungle for 4 seasons now. I want his ward-hopping gone. No replacement. No more coddling. You want a champion that does a ton of damage and oppresses other junglers? You don't get a safety net. You want the wardhop? Then you pay for it with ult scaling and Q base and scaling. You can't have it all just because you want to say "but he's hard to plaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaay!!!! WAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHH!"

Don't see what the big deal is. If they buff other junglers or nerf lee then someone else will just take his place, be circle jerked as broken and nerfed until lee comes back in the meta the next patch.

Lee has been strong throughout his entire existence in the game.
Similar champions, Kassadin, Azir, etc. who only had a year or so of strength were nerfed to the point their pick rate is <2% and their best winrates on favorable patches only barely match Lee's worst.

His time in the spotlight needs to end.

Think about this one second. Are you sure that this is what _you_ **personally** want? I don't think you are thinking about this straight. He's just common, not really strong. I don't think that is a valid reason to 'take him out the spot light'. He's not opressive and can be out played and countered so why the hate for him? You know that saying that the enemy picking him means an automatic loss for you is a bit untrue right?

His popularity goes up quite a bit the further you go up in elo but his winrate is still ~50 percent? Why don't you have this kind of hatred for ivern? Is it because he's not as popular? Because he has a 55+ winrate from gold up. Have you ever considered that the reason that people play lee is not because he's strong but because they just genuinly like the champion?

Why don't you hate thresh? Is it because he's a support. He has always been a bit strong. No, let me rephrase that. Popular. He has a 26% winrate from gold upwards. 

Let me show you something. These three champions - {{champion:236}} {{champion:51}}  and {{champion:81}} have playrates of 35.3%, 26.4% and 24.3% respectively. That is a combined play rate of 86% for **ONE ROLE**!
http://www.leagueofgraphs.com/
And one of them has a play rate just 2% off from lee's.

So why aren't you saying anything about them? Is it because no one else is? I don't understand what you want riot to actually fix. He's not strong. He's just popular. They nerfed him a few patches ago but his winrate steadily *rose* so its definately not his strength that's the problem. I think it's just that people like playing him. And nerfing him soley on that is kinda unfair for the people who like to play him.

Just to clarify I'm not salty or anything. Never played Lee Sin in my life. I just genuinly want to know the answers to the questions I asked and what is you end game? Jungle isn't a very diverse role (well it's more diverse than bot anyways) but if Lee get's nerfed isn't someone else just going to dominate? Are you sure what you're asking for is balance and not self satisfaction? Well I wouldn't say self satisfaction because I don't think even have of the people who 'hate' Lee Sin would do so if everyone else didn't. So, yeah. I've said alot, sorry (^_^'). Let me know what you think?
I guess a champ being popular because they are _fun to play_  is out of the realm of possibility huh? If they're popular they must be op.
